ifYouHaveWon: If you have won, you should have received a winning code.
pleaseWaitWhileWeVerify: Please wait while we verify your code.
clickBelowToChooseColor: Click below to choose a color.
selectYourPreferredColor: Select your preferred color for your iPhone 16.
verificationDescription: Before we can provide you with the receipt to pick up your iPhone at a nearby store, you must pass the human verification test, by confirming your phone number by an sms. In our last giveaway, we found that over half of the prizes went to bots.
theCodeEnteredIsIncorrect: The code entered is incorrect. Please try again.
